Delete your account

If you'd like to stop using Field Guide, you can fully remove your account from our system. This will stop all scheduled payments and will remove your tests and reports. We strongly suggest you use the Export button above to save a backup of your information before deleting your account. Deletion cannot be undone, it is permanent.
